invalid_policy_names: Editing the assigned user for priority 1 incident ticket is not allowed unless there is no user assigned to the incident ticket
Catalog items cannot be moved to categories that are inactive
Ticket being resolved must have someone assigned to the ticket.
Assets that cost over $10000 cannot be transferred
Change requests with risk level 'Moderate' or higher cannot be scheduled on Fridays
Serial numbers cannot be modified once asset is marked as 'In Use'
